review_title: Such a satisfying place to work
pros:
Brilliant Team 
Dedicated Board of Directors
cons: Need to make sure take responsibility for self care

pros: Ambitious staff working hard to support unpaid carers, good staff support from managers and flexible working, great reputation locally- staff get permanent contract after one year (not sure where previous reviewer got their information ?)
cons: Work is now more complex - greater challenges juggling time- hard to keep up with all the different things that centre delivers

job_title: Project Worker in Arbroath, Angus, Scotland
pros:
Nice office space with parking
Some great colleagues
cons: Poor management / board of directors.   Communication throughout organisation is non existent unless you are one of the favoured few.  Line management/ staff support non existent.  Funding not managed, staff feel insecure, wondering whether their post will continue to be funded each year.

job_title: Project Coordinator in Arbroath, Angus, Scotland
cons:
No permanent contracts
Poor management structure
Uncertain future
